scripts.dev: yarn workspace web run generate-imported-component && yarn workspace tools run parcel:dev
scripts.clean:nodes: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock yarn-error.log root/node_modules root/public/web/node_modules root/public/native/node_modules root/public/core/node_modules root/public/tools/node_modules root/public/api/node_modules root/yarn.lock root/public/web/yarn.lock root/public/native/yarn.lock root/public/core/yarn.lock root/public/tools/yarn.lock root/public/api/yarn.lock root/yarn-error.log root/public/web/yarn-error.log root/public/native/yarn-error.log root/public/core/yarn-error.log root/public/tools/yarn-error.log root/public/api/yarn-error.log
